name: Open Plans Unpack
description: Unpack projects data from open plans.

inputParameters.name: OpenPlansData
inputParameters.description: Open Plans data in the form of an dict or class instance.

outputParameters.name: properties
outputParameters.description: Property values from open plans projects (readable by Grasshopper in tree structure).

outputParameters.name: propertyNames
outputParameters.description: Project property field names from open plans projects (readable by Grasshopper in list).
